comments:

being up or crashes alltogether.

I have the min heap size set to 256M and Max set to 512M in the Info.plist file. This error happens 
while trying to save a resource.

I have not been able to get Eclipse running for more than 10 minutes at a time. Although i do not have 
an exact sequence of events that causes the issue, it does happen in about 10 mins of use.

Eclipse 2.1.2 is known to not run well on Panther, since at the time of its 
release the current Mac OS was Jaguar.  You should have better luck running 
with Jaguar, or if this isn't possible, getting an eclipse 3.0 build.

The OutOfMemory error has nothing to do with swt.

The NoMoreHandles error could be either a lack of OS handles, or some other 
problem with creating the image.  Moving to SSQ to investigate, but without a 
reproducable case it will be difficult to determine what's happening.

Since these problems haven't been reported before, they don't seem to be a widespread problem of 
2.1.2 on Panther.
Could you please try whether these problems occur with Eclipse 3.0 too?
Silenio, since we haven't received the requested information I'd suggest to close this one.
